resources.string: We prioritize your privacy above all else. Your data is sacred to us, so it stays strictly private and secure. When it comes to fake Lives, only you have access to your own. So, relax, have fun, and let us take care of the rest!
Hey! Check out %s app on Google Play: %s
This lets you start the Live. You can change this anytime in your device settings.
Please help us improve %s by sharing your feedback
Requests to co-host show up here.
When someone joins, anyone who can see their live videos can also watch this one.
Anyone watching can send and see questions here.
Everyone watching will see it on screen.
There is no way to send this live stream.

string-array.name: long_comments
string-array.item: You\'ve got a fan for life
I can\'t get enough of this
You bring so much joy to us
This is a highlight of my day
Consistently engaging content, your creativity brings joy to every viewer
Your storytelling captivates; each video is a memorable, delightful adventure
Top-tier quality, your dedication shines in every video you produce
You\'re a source of inspiration, turning creativity into a masterpiece
Authentic, entertaining, and positively impactful — your content is exceptional
Intriguing narratives, your videos are a breath of fresh creativity
Captivating charisma, your presence makes every moment thoroughly enjoyable
Skillful storytelling, your videos leave a lasting and positive impression
Consistent excellence, your content elevates the online experience for everyone
Creative brilliance, your unique approach sets you apart in every aspect
Entertaining escapades, your videos are a delightful journey of discovery
Enthusiastic and engaging, your content brightens even the gloomiest days
Your work radiates passion, making each piece truly extraordinary and memorable
Artistic flair, your videos are a testament to your creative prowess
Relatable and authentic, your content feels like a genuine connection

string-array.name: question_comments
string-array.item: What do you like to do in your free time?
What was the last series you watched?
What was the last event or occasion you remember?
What do you like most about your work/studies?
What skill would you like to learn in the near future?
What\'s your favorite series or movie right now?
Have you listened to anything cool recently?
What music do you listen to?
What do you do in the evenings?
What games do you like to play?
What will you do after the stream?
What\'s the last interesting fact you learned?
Is there something you dream about?
Have you ever been to a concert?
Are you waiting for any releases?
In which movie would you like to act?
Where would you go on a trip?
What book do you think everyone should read?
Where would you like to live?
Which movie or book had the greatest impact on you?
If you could choose any profession without worrying about money, what would it be?
Is there something you\'ve always wanted to try?
What event left the biggest mark on your life?
What three things would you take with you to a deserted island?
Would you like to visit the past?
Do you prefer giving or receiving gifts?
What to do on a rainy day?
If you could change one event in your life, what would it be?
What is your happiest childhood memory?
What motivates you the most every day?
What motivates you to get up in the morning?
If you could get an answer to any question, what would you ask?
What\'s the most important thing in life?
What did you want to be when you grew up?
What\'s the most unusual dish you\'ve ever tried?
Which country or culture do you find most interesting and why?
Do you have a favorite place?
Do you have goals for the year?
If you could choose any talent, what would you want?
What genre of music or movies do you think is most underrated?
Do you like to take risks?
Do you prefer summer or winter?
What language would you like to know? Why?
What do you like most about the place where you live now?
If you could meet any character from a book/movie, who would it be?
What advice would you give to every person on Earth?
Do you prefer adventure or relaxation?
Are you a morning person or a night owl?
What\'s the best gift you\'ve ever received?
What do you think about space travel?
Movies at home or in the cinema?
Do you prefer movies or series?
What movie genres do you like?
What music genres do you like?
Do you prefer hot or cold weather?
Do you prefer active leisure or relaxation?
Do you prefer sweet or salty?
Do you prefer to plan in advance or live spontaneously?
Do you prefer to spend time in company or alone?
